nodes.text: Wodibin was a male Suerton who resided in Canto Bight and spent a night, along with his older brothers Dodibin and Thodibin, gambling with Kaljach Sonmi. His nickname was simply Wodi. Collectively he and his brothers were known as The Lucky Three due to their uncanny ability to win big at gambling and make back anything they might lose.

In Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, Wodibin was played by Warwick Davis, an actor who has also notably appeared throughout the Star Wars saga as Wicket, Wald, Weazel, Wollivan and Weeteef Cyu-Bee, amongst others.
